participant_1.background:
I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.
I have been eavesdropping on my neighbors for many years, but the weather has never been a factor.
i have won an olympic medal.
i am a civil war reenactment participant.

participant_2.background:
I met the love of my life while working at the hospital.
i like to make boats on the weekends.
i wish that i could be an animal.
i enjoy baking and cooking.
I do care about my appearance, but it's not my main focus.

content.text: Nice to meet you Alice. What do you do for fun?
I like to bake and cook. I also enjoy making boats on the weekends.
That's cool. I used to like to bake too, but I haven't done it in a while. What's your favorite thing to bake?
I like to bake cookies. I also like to make cakes and pies.
I'm not much of a baker, but I do enjoy eating cookies. I like chocolate chip cookies the best.
I like chocolate chip cookies too. I also like to make snickerdoodles.
Those are good too. I've never made snickerdoodles before.
They're easy to make. You just need flour, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, and sugar.
That sounds easy enough. I might have to try making them sometime.
I'm sure they are. I'm also a fan of Nascar. I'm going to watch the race on Sunday.
That's cool. I've never been to a Nascar race, but I've watched them on TV a few times.
They're really exciting to watch. The drivers are so skilled.
I'm sure they are. I'm not much of a sports fan, but I can appreciate the skill that goes into Nascar racing.
I'm not a huge sports fan either, but I do like to watch Nascar.
I'm glad I met you. You seem like a cool person.
